scripts.rap: npm run lib && rm -rf rap && mkdir rap && cp -R lib rap && cp package.json rap && sed 's/npm/rap/g' README.md > rap/README.md && cd rap && rap publish
scripts.dist: npm run lib && rm -rf dist/ && mkdir dist && browserify lib/index.js | uglifyjs -c > dist/aliyun-iot-device-sdk.min.js
scripts.buildJS: npm run lib && rm -rf dist/ && mkdir dist && browserify lib/index.js  > dist/aliyun-iot-device-sdk.js
scripts.pubus: rm -rf unstabitily && mkdir unstabitily && cp package.unstabitily.json unstabitily/ && mv ./unstabitily/package.unstabitily.json ./unstabitily/package.json &&   cp README.md ./unstabitily && cp -r lib/ ./unstabitily  && tnpm publish ./unstabitily/
